data.title: Book Donations Sites
data.text:
The Saint Louis University Medical Center Library no longer accepts book donations. Other sites for book donations include:

Salvation Army

Headquarters:

1130 Hampton Ave - (314) 646-3000

Thrift stores:

4121 Forest Park Ave. 63108 - (314) 535-2000

2823 Cherokee 63118 - (314) 771-2684

3801 Nameoki Road - (618) 876-9150

3740 Telegraph Road 63010 - (636) 464-0787

2700 Droste Road 63301 - (636) 947-8489

They will pick up depending on zip code. Call (314) 535-0057 to reach their pick-up service.

They will write a tax receipt.

St. Vincent de Paul

Thrift Stores:

10052 W. Florissant Ave 63136 - (314) 867-7837

14660 Manchester Road 63011 - (636) 207-7837

4928 Christy Blvd 63116 - (314) 352-4000

1069 Regency Pkwy - (636) 946-1700

3924 Lemay Ferry Road - (314) 845-7837

They will pick up depending on the zip code. (call the above numbers)

They will write a tax receipt.

Greater St. Louis Book Fair

They will pick up 10 or more boxes. Call (314) 993-1995 to arrange pickup.

Drop off donations at several locations in the St. Louis area.

They will write a tax receipt.

Visit the Greater St. Louis Book Fair Website

Better World Books

Drop off boxes around St. Louis (map on website) or go to their website for a prepaid shipping label.

Visit the Better World Books Website
